channel.title: LT3 on Go Conference 2021 Spring
channel.description: Recent content in LT3 on Go Conference 2021 Spring

item.title: Learning unsung gotchas of Go
item.description: How about saving yourself from natural traps? How about saving yourself from faulty assumptions and loopholes in details? Fear not! Let’s delve deeper into the most simplistic and fun language, i.e. Go with care! Go is one of the simplistic, neat and effective language but it has few gotchas. These gotchas run the gamut from minor syntactic annoyances to psychological behaviour. By sharing the invaluable references - this talk will give the taste of various gotchas which will henceforth save Go programmer’s time and wasted effort.
